p: After drying the prepupae and pre-experiment substrates, they were crushed using a laboratory blender and then ashed and digested in 6â€‰N HCl. An Atomic Absorption Spectrophotometer (Model AA6300, Shimadu, Japan) was used to analyze the following minerals: phosphorus, potassium, calcium, magnesium, sodium, iron, copper, manganese, cobalt and zinc.
